Hello John!

I am planning the annual User Conference for Ingeniux - a web experience management company based in Seattle. I’d like to speak with you about presenting at the conference as a Featured Speaker.

This event would take place October 2, 2015. I’ve included more conference details below. We’re looking for someone who can speak about the ASP.NET technology road-map, as well as the advantages to working within that ecosystem.

If you are interested in speaking, please send me your availability and speaking fees via email.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best, Riley
